instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820 - 2879 - B 80% boot's then resets
threads.message:
Hello,

Issue happens with external and internal boot drive
Issue happens when trying to boot to safe mode. 

Verbose boot hopefully provides some clues (last 2 lines)

IOBluetoothFamily -- missing Bluetooth Controller Transport!
nspace-handler-set-snapshot-time:979599617

I have tried unplugging the screen cable which connects the bluetooth module but it has bade no difference. 
SMC Reset with and without cable connected - no difference

Happy to provide more information but I do not know where to start on this one.

threads.title: 820 - 2879 - B 80% boot's then resets
threads.message: Bluetooth module is connected through J3401...
